General.Name: Coinbase Global Inc
General.Description: Coinbase Global, Inc. operates platform for crypto assets in the United States and internationally. It offers the primary financial account in the crypto economy for consumers; a brokerage platform with a pool of liquidity across the crypto marketplace for institutions; and a suite of products granting access to build onchain for developers. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: One Madison Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10010
